segments.text: I'd like to buy a ticket to Casablanca on flight US125 tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hold on , plese.It will take off at 14:00 tomorrow.The price is $ 110 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I want to stay under $ 100 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry Sir . We won't give any discount in busy seasons.The price is the same .
segments.speaker: S1
